articles.title: Tel Aviv : 40 , 000 People Rally Against Violence In Arab Communities
articles.summary: Nearly 40,000 people gathered Saturday evening in Habima Square, Tel Aviv, to protest rising violence in Arab society and what they describe as authoritiesâ€™ repeated inaction. The demonstration came just hours after 25-year-old Omar al-Shamali was shot dead in Lod during a family conflict, highlighting the urgent issue protesters aimed to address. Two others were injured, one seriously. Al-Shamaliâ€™s death marks the 27th murder within Israelâ€™s Ara

articles.title: South Sudan -  All the Conditions for a Human Catastrophe Are Present
articles.summary: Military tensions in South Sudan are 'rapidly expanding' between Government forces and opposition militia as fighting continues in restive Jonglei state. Briefing journalists based at UN Headquarters in New York on Friday, Anita Kiki Gbeho, Officer in Charge of the UN Mission in South Sudan ( UNMISS ), said Jonglei has become a 'flashpoint' for fighting, with civilians caught in the crossfire.
